EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_SF Labs Mixer_SF_Q317.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal San Francisco Happy Hour | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registrering for the San Francisco Labs Mixer on September 21st. You will be contacted when your registration is confirmed.
We hope you will leave this workshop with a better understanding of cloud-native development <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> and how to adopt it moving forward. If you would like to participate in hands-on exercises please bring a laptop.
Please note that happy hour will be held at Galvanize San Francisco - Soma <[[https://www.galvanize.com/san-francisco/campus]]> at 5:30PM.
Date: Thursday, September 21, 2017
Time:
5:30PM to 9:30PM
Location: Galvanize Rooftop 44 Tehama St San Francisco, CA, 94105 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Galvanize+San+Francisco+-+Soma/@37.787613,-122.396638,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3cfc91016a294580!8m2!3d37.787613!4d-122.396638]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at CONTACT@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/SF-Labs-Mixer.html]]>
